mapper.update:
update cm_cust_segment
SEGMENT_ID = #{record.segmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UP_SEGMENT_ID = #{record.upSegmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REL_ID = #{record.relId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SEGMENT_NAME = #{record.segmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALLOW_INHERITABLE = #{record.allowInheritable,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ALLOW_REVISABLE = #{record.allowRevisable,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ALLOW_CREDIT_CALCULATED = #{record.allowCreditCalculated,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ALLOW_APPROVABLE = #{record.allowApprovable,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ALLOW_MANUAL = #{record.allowManual,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PROCESS_DEF = #{record.processDef,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_OP_ID = #{record.createOpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_ORG_ID = #{record.createOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OP_ID = #{record.opId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ORG_ID = #{record.orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DONE_CODE = #{record.doneCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},

DONE_DATE = #{record.doneDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{record.effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_DATE = #{record.expireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REGION_ID = #{record.regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTICE_PERIOD = #{record.noticePeriod,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NOTIFY_TYPE = #{record.notifyType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
